Colossal Smash.name: Colossal Smash
Colossal Smash.blurb: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.
Colossal Smash.description: Innate: Galio's next basic attack deals 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance)  total magic damage to its target and all enemies around it.
Colossal Smash.description2: Colossal Smash can  critically strike, dealing (100% +  25%) AD bonus magic damage to all targets hit.
Colossal Smash.notes:
* Applies  proc damage to the primary target and  area damage to surrounding targets.
  Spellblade will also get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

Winds of War.name: Winds of War
Winds of War.blurb: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
Winds of War.description: Active: Galio fires two windblasts that arc to either side before converging to the target area, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
Winds of War.description2: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that advances for 1.5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to every enemy within, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against  monsters.
Winds of War.leveling2:
Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick:
2% (+ 0.66% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Total Tornado Magic Damage:
6% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Winds of War.notes:
* Spell shields will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
  Yasuo's  Wind Wall and  Braum's  Unbreakable can block each windblast individually.
 The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.

Shield of Durand.name: Shield of Durand
Shield of Durand.blurb: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
Shield of Durand.description: Passive: Upon learning Shield of Durand or after not taking damage for 12 seconds, Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark.
Shield of Durand.description2: Anti-Magic Bulwark: Galio gains a  shield that exclusively blocks magic damage.
Shield of Durand.leveling2:
Magic Damage Shield:
8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20% of his maximum health
Shield of Durand.description3: First Cast: Galio charges for up to 3 seconds,  grounding and  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction. Charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration.
Shield of Durand.leveling3:
Magic Damage Reduction:
20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% (+ 5% per 100 AP) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
Physical Damage Reduction:
10 / 12.5 / 15 / 17.5 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)
Shield of Durand.description4: Second Cast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds,  taunts nearby enemies and sets their  movement speed to a static 60 for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on charge time) seconds.
Shield of Durand.description5: Affected enemies take magic damage, increased by 0% − 200% (based on charge time).
Shield of Durand.leveling5:
Minimum Magic Damage:
20 / 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 (+ 30% AP)
Maximum Magic Damage:
60 / 105 / 150 / 195 / 240 (+ 90% AP)
Shield of Durand.notes:
* Static movement speed means that the target is unable to modify it anymore (ex: with slow resist /  On the Hunt).
 This effect is negated only if the target is slow immune (ex:  Highlander).

 After the second cast, there is a brief period where other spells can only be buffered.
 Possible Bug: The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except from  Winds of War.

Justice Punch.name: Justice Punch
Justice Punch.blurb: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
Justice Punch.description: Active: Galio steps backwards, and after 0.4 seconds he  dashes forward, though not through terrain.
Justice Punch.description2: He stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them and all enemies along the way magic damage, while also  knocking them up for 0.75 seconds. Non-champions receive 50% reduced damage.
Justice Punch.leveling2:
Champion Magic Damage:
90 / 130 / 170 / 210 / 250 (+ 90% AP)
Reduced Magic Damage:
45 / 65 / 85 / 105 / 125 (+ 45% AP)
Justice Punch.notes:
* Non-champions hit receive  area damage, while champions take  spell damage.
 Galio can cast movement effects during the ability, and buffers all other active effects.

Hero's Entrance.name: Hero's Entrance
Hero's Entrance.blurb: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
Hero's Entrance.description: Active: Galio designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot,  channels for 1.25 seconds, and then  dashes to them, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and  knocking them up for 0.75 seconds.
Hero's Entrance.notes:
* Galio becomes completely  untargetable while in the air.
Galio cannot cast Hero's Entrance on allies at long distances while  nearsighted.
